Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe you'll find immense value in it. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a fantastic deal considering its market value is significantly higher. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-notch product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
